runOnly.description: Run only a specified list of Rules

type.description: The type to run. Can either be 'tag' or 'rule
The type to run. Can either be 'tag' or 'rule

accesskeys.description: Ensures every accesskey attribute value is unique

area-alt.description: Ensures <area> elements of image maps have alternate text

aria-allowed-attr.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are allowed for an element's role

aria-required-attr.description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes

aria-required-children.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them

aria-required-parent.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require parent roles are contained by them

aria-roles.description: Ensures all elements with a role attribute use a valid value

aria-valid-attr.description: Ensures attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes

aria-valid-attr-value.description: Ensures all ARIA attributes have valid values

bypass.description: Ensures each page has at least one mechanism for a user to bypass navigation and jump straight to the content

checkboxgroup.description: Ensures related <input type="checkbox"> elements have a group and that that group designation is consistent

color-contrast.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds

dlitem.description: Ensures <dt> and <dd> elements are contained by a <dl>

document-title.description: Ensures each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element

duplicate-id.description: Ensures every id attribute value is unique

frame-title.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain a unique and non-empty title attribute

heading-order.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

html-has-lang.description: Ensures every HTML document has a lang attribute

html-lang-valid.description: Ensures the lang attribute of the <html> element has a valid value

image-alt.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation

image-redundant-alt.description: Ensure button and link text is not repeated as image alternative

input-image-alt.description: Ensures <input type="image"> elements have alternate text

label.description: Ensures every form element has a label

label-title-only.description: Ensures that every form element is not solely labeled using the title or aria-describedby attributes

layout-table.description: Ensures presentational <table> elements do not use <th>, <caption> elements or the summary attribute

link-in-text-block.description: Links can be distinguished without relying on color

list.description: Ensures that lists are structured correctly

meta-viewport.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming

meta-viewport-large.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> can scale a significant amount

radiogroup.description: Ensures related <input type="radio"> elements have a group and that the group designation is consistent

region.description: Ensures all content is contained within a landmark region

scope-attr-valid.description: Ensures the scope attribute is used correctly on tables

server-side-image-map.description: Ensures that server-side image maps are not used

skip-link.description: Ensures the first link on the page is a skip link

tabindex.description: Ensures tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0

table-duplicate-name.description: Ensure that tables do not have the same summary and caption

table-fake-caption.description: Ensure that tables with a caption use the <caption> element

td-has-header.description: Ensure that each non-empty data cell in a large table has one or more table headers

td-headers-attr.description: Ensure that each cell in a table using the headers refers to another cell in that table

th-has-data-cells.description: Ensure that each table header in a data table refers to data cells

valid-lang.description: Ensures lang attributes have valid values
